calculateNoOfRank1Castles(int) - Method in class model.Config
This method calculates the no of rank 1 castles based on the no of players.

This class defines the castle components for the game.

Default constructor.

The coin class creates coins for the players during game play.

Default constructor.

Coin.Material - Enum in components
An enum type to restrict the materials of the coins.
Coin.Material() - Constructor for enum components.Coin.Material
 
coinBank - Variable in class model.GameInstance
 
color - Variable in class components.Castle
Note that the private member 'color' of this class is the same as the players color.
